entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 04:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: N 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Snow at times mixed with freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
